author: Staff Reporter
text: A prisoner at the Puzhal Prison died after he allegedly suffered an epileptic attack on Wednesday. According to the police, Siva, a resident of Pallavaram was arrested by the railway police in Tambaram some months ago. While having bath on Wednesday, he had an epileptic attack and he slipped and fell. He was rushed to the hospital in an ambulance but died on the way.
title: Prisoner dies at Puzhal
